update t_resume
nearest_station = #{nearestStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
graduation_ym = #{graduationYm,jdbcType=CHAR},
degree = #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school_name = #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
certification1 = #{certification1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
certification2 = #{certification2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

tc_os_unix = #{tcOsUnix,jdbcType=CHAR},
tc_os_solaris = #{tcOsSolaris,jdbcType=CHAR},
tc_os_hpux = #{tcOsHpux,jdbcType=CHAR},
tc_os_aix = #{tcOsAix,jdbcType=CHAR},
tc_os_linux = #{tcOsLinux,jdbcType=CHAR},
tc_os_dos = #{tcOsDos,jdbcType=CHAR},
tc_os_mac = #{tcOsMac,jdbcType=CHAR},
tc_pg_cobol = #{tcPgCobol,jdbcType=CHAR},

tc_db_access = #{tcDbAccess,jdbcType=CHAR},
tc_etc_weblogic = #{tcEtcWeblogic,jdbcType=CHAR},
tc_etc_j2ee = #{tcEtcJ2ee,jdbcType=CHAR},

tc_etc_tomcat = #{tcEtcTomcat,jdbcType=CHAR},
tc_etc_jp1 = #{tcEtcJp1,jdbcType=CHAR},
tc_etc_cosminexus = #{tcEtcCosminexus,jdbcType=CHAR},

upd_time = #{updTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=CHAR} and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and resume_ver_kbn = #{resumeVerKbn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_resume set nearest_station = #{nearestStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, graduation_ym = #{graduationYm,jdbcType=CHAR}, degree = #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school_name = #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certification1 = #{certification1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certification2 = #{certification2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certification3 = #{certification3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certification4 = #{certification4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certification5 = #{certification5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certification6 = #{certification6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, experience_years = #{experienceYears,jdbcType=REAL}, responsible = #{responsible,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lg_jp_business_con = #{lgJpBusinessCon,jdbcType=CHAR}, lg_jp_daily_con = #{lgJpDailyCon,jdbcType=CHAR}, lg_jp_reading = #{lgJpReading,jdbcType=CHAR}, lg_jp_listening = #{lgJpListening,jdbcType=CHAR}, lg_jp_writting = #{lgJpWritting,jdbcType=CHAR}, lg_en_business_con = #{tcDbOracle,jdbcType=CHAR}, tc_db_hirdb = #{tcDbHirdb,jdbcType=CHAR}, tc_db_sqlserver = #{tcDbSqlserver,jdbcType=CHAR}, tc_db_db2 = #{tcDbDb2,jdbcType=CHAR}, tc_db_mysql = #{tcDbMysql,jdbcType=CHAR}, tc_db_postgresql = #{tcDbPostgresql,jdbcType=CHAR}, tc_db_access = #{tcDbAccess,jdbcType=CHAR}, tc_etc_weblogic = #{tcEtcWeblogic,jdbcType=CHAR}, tc_etc_j2ee = #{tcEtcJ2ee,jdbcType=CHAR}, tc_etc_websphere = #{tcEtcWebsphere,jdbcType=CHAR}, tc_etc_tomcat = #{tcEtcTomcat,jdbcType=CHAR}, tc_etc_jp1 = #{tcEtcJp1,jdbcType=CHAR}, tc_etc_cosminexus = #{tcEtcCosminexus,jdbcType=CHAR}, tc_etc_xamarin = #{tcEtcXamarin,jdbcType=CHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, reg_account = #{regAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_time = #{regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upd_account = #{updAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upd_time = #{updTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=CHAR} and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and resume_ver_kbn = #{resumeVerKbn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t.company_code , t.user_id , concat(u.first_name ,' ', u.last_name) as userName , t.resume_ver_kbn , m.category_kbn_name as resume_ver_name , t.remarks , date_format(t.upd_time, '%y/%m/%d %h:%i') as upd_time from t_resume t left join m_user_detail u on u.company_code = t.company_code and u.user_id = t.user_id left join m_category m on m.company_code = t.company_code and m.category_class_number = '070' and m.category_kbn = t.resume_ver_kbn where t.company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=CHAR} and t.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select t.company_code , t.user_id , t.resume_ver_kbn from t_resume t where t.company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=CHAR} and t.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by t.upd_time desc limit 1
